abstract: As insurers grow larger, the effect on consumers depends largely on how successfully other companies, particularly those created or attracted by the Affordable Care Act, can compete.
snippet: As insurers grow larger, the effect on consumers depends largely on how successfully other companies, particularly those created or attracted by the Affordable Care Act, can compete.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s five largest health insurance companies are circling one another like hungry lions closing in on prey.

headline.main: With Merging of Insurers, Questions for Patients About Costs and Innovation
headline.print_headline: With Fusion of Insurers, Questions for Patients

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
